title: Cognitive Load Management Strategies for Complex Cognitive Task Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Foundational Educational Theories and Social Studies Content
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service and in-service teachers to learn effective methods of teaching complex social studies content. Combines online modules and practical assignments in a BYOD environment, allowing participants to progress at their own pace

learning_goals: Learners can reduce cognitive load by 30% or more by designing step-wise chunking strategies for complex cognitive tasks.
Learners can explain criteria for selecting visual/verbal instructional media that promote learner attention with 80% accuracy.
Learners can create and implement lesson plans applying cognitive load management strategies in real-world social studies contexts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
